div.div: Please check this page frequently for updated information regarding Randolph County Schools for the duration of the shutdown period.
Please use the link to view the video.
Students please remember that Chromebooks were sent home for academic use. We are still monitoring Chromebook use with Bark.
Accelerated Reader is being made available off-campus for students to continue taking reading tests.

div.p:
The mission of the Randolph County School
District is to provide experiences which will
enable the attainment of maximum potential.
Opportunities will be provided that will result in
students who are achieving and productive
members of society.

div.p:
The Randolph County Board of Education does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, disability, or age in its programs and activities and provides equal access to Boy Scouts of America and other designated youth groups. The following people have been designated to handle inquiries regarding
the non-discrimination policies:
Beth Bailey, Section 504 Coordinator 256-357-4611 x.2012
Mary Kelly, Title IX Coordinator 256-357-4611 x.2011
Beth Bailey, Title II/Special Needs Coordinator 256-357-4611 x.2012
John Jacobs, ADA Coordinator 256-357-4611 x.2002
